Texts.Eng:
+10 Armor with a Shield equipped.
After Perfect Shielding, nearby allies gain +5 Armor for 10 seconds.
150% Base Power While Dual-Wielding Machine Pistols and Shields.

Pressing [W] toggles Atlas' Burden, a buff that halves Shield Stamina and Jump Height, but provides bonuses for your shield. While Atlas' Burden is active, enemies that hit your Shield have a 25% chance to be stunned for half a second; Perfect Shields stun all nearby enemies for one second; and Perfect Shields grant you and nearby allies 110% Base Power Multiplier, 120% Armor, and Knockback Immunity for five seconds.
